modName: ESO Highelf Armor Animated with HDT Skinned Mesh Physics
summary: This armor was originally created by newermind43. I animated it and altered the metal textures. You need to download his mod first, and then overwrite everything with my mod.
descriptionHtml:
Video here: [youtube]UrG9pPbjhdU[/youtube]


I have never played Elder Scroll Online yet. But I did like the CG films of the game. I would prefer elder scroll 6, still I 'm waiting for it.

Accidentally I found this highelf armor on nexus, amazing and emthusiastic work by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64532]Newermind43[/url]
And I found the original physics is less perfect. Then I decided to animated it with [url=http://www.9damao.com/thread-10197-1-1.html]Skinned Mesh Physics[/url]﻿, short for [b]SMP[/b].  It's a chinese skyrim forum, no doubt the Physics framework was programmed by a chinese dude called [b]hydrogensayshdt, [/b]he is also the author of [b]HDT physics extension[/b].If you know chinese language, I suggest you download it through [url=http://www.9damao.com/thread-10197-1-1.html]here[/url]. 

Looks like smp won't be posted here on nexus. So you can either choose the chinese site or download it through another post "[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88416]yundao_hdt_hair[/url]", find SMP PE from mainfiles section.

Follow the Requirement: 
1.[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996]HDT-pe[/url] by [b]hydrogensayshdt. [/b]you need to install it first. Because the breasts are still animated with HDT-PE. If you already have it. just ignore this.
2. [url=http://www.9damao.com/thread-10197-1-1.html]Skinned Mesh Physics (SMP)[/url] by [b]hydrogensayshdt. [/b]It's chinese site. you can also download it through another post "[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88416]yundao_hdt_hair[/url]﻿", find SMP PE        from mainfiles section.
    "smp pe" is the result of intalling both HDT-PE and SMP. Once you choose it, you have no need to install HDT-PE anymore. 
3. You need to download  [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64532]newermind43[/url] mod first, download two main files, and then overwrite everything with my mod.
4. make sure Microsoft Visual C++ 2015 (or newer) Redistributable X86 available on your PC.

By the way I also changed the metal textures. Hope you like it.

Credits:
[b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3701232]hydrogensayshdt[/url]﻿
[/b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2959649]newermind43[/url]
And last but not least, Bethesda.
author: Model by newermind43
